In Bangladesh natural gas is presently playing a very significant role in the economic development. The country so far has discovered 25 gas fields including 2 offshore ones. The total initial gas reserve in the 25 fields has been estimated at 20.63 Tcf. Daily productions from 80 wells out of 17 gas fields are about 1.83 Bcf(Source: Annual report,Petrobangla,2009 )
